description: A physical device or media, such as a server, laptop, workstation, smartphone, tablet, router, firewall, switch, wifi-access-point, usb-drive, etc. The exact data type is described in the _type property of the Entity.

make.description: Same as hardwareVendor: The manufacturer or vendor of the device, e.g. Apple Inc., Generic

model.description: Same as hardwareModel: The device hardware model, e.g. MacBookPro13,3

version.description: Same as hardwareVersion: The device hardware version

serial.description: Same as hardwareSerial: The device serial number

deviceId.description: The unique device identifier, traditionally known as a UDID

hardwareVendor.description: The manufacturer or vendor of the device, e.g. Apple Inc., Generic

hardwareModel.description: The device hardware model, e.g. MacBookPro13,3

assetTag.description: The asset tag number/label that matches the identifier in asset tracking system, for company owned physical devices

osDetails.description: Operating System Full Details (e.g. macOS High Sierra version 10.13.6)

userEmails.description: The email addresses of the users this device is assigned to. Used if the device is shared by more than one user. Otherwise the 'owner' is the sole user. Leave empty/undefined if the device is unassigned.

location.description: Site where this device is located.

cost.description: The purchase cost of the device.

value.description: The estimated business value of the device. The value is typically calculated as the monetary cost of the device + the value of data on the device.

BYOD.description: Indicates if this is a BYOD device -- an employee-provided device that has access to company systems/resources.

autoSecurityPatchEnabled.description: Indicates if security updates are auto-installed

autoSystemPatchEnabled.description: Indicates if operating system updates are auto-installed

encrypted.description: Indicates if the primary device storage is encrypted

malwareProtected.description: Indicates if malware protection is enabled

firewallEnabled.description: Indicates if local/host firewall is enabled

remoteAccessEnabled.description: Indicates if remote access/login to the device is enabled

screenLockEnabled.description: Indicates if screen lock protection is enabled
